title: [Gleyminn Anni River, Cottage]
description: Tendrils of mist creep across the slate-colored waters and wrap around the trunk of an immense willow affording a leafy bower on the western embankment.  The mild river washes across a vast slab of rock poking up from the depths, the current eroding a swirl-like pattern on its face.  A grey stone cottage with a thatched roof can be glimpsed, nestled far back in a copse of trees.
